FME. A bunch of peoplegot laid off,and some of the FMEersare already moving in.

Vanessa Gekko.

What's new, pussycat?

Ha ha. How are you?
What a morning, huh?
I was in the middleof my second soul cycle classwhen I got the news.
- Can you imagine?- No.

I was so excited,I rushed home,made loveto my husband of 15 years,made a hot breakfastfor my three wonderful girls,read to them, dropped them offat their elite private school,and then got my ass hereas quick as I could.
